department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Purchase a Faraday Tent located in Montreal, Quebec.
description: Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)\\ntendering Procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid\\n Competitive Procurement Strategy: Lowest/Lower Bid\\nComprehensive Land Claim Agreement: No\\n\nFaraday Tent\\nPSPC, on behalf of Environment and Climate Change Canada, is issuing this request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition a Faraday Tent delivery located in Montreal, Quebec, Canada, as detailed in Annex Requirement.\\n\nDelivery Date: Above-mentioned\\n\\nThe Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.\\n\\nDocuments may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
full_summary:
### Add the title you want
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Solicitation Number
PW-__QD-052-29246 

### Publication Date
2023-12-19

### Tender Closing Date and Time
2024-02-07T14:00:00

### Description

This announcement invites trade agreements as per the Canadian Free Trade Agreement. Interested suppliers can submit a bid for the acquisition of a Faraday tent. The comprehensive land claim agreement is non-applicable in this situation.

### Contract Information

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** To be determined
* **Expected Contract End Date:** To be determined
* **Crown Reserves the Right to Negotiate:** Yes

### Procurement Details
* **Trade Agreement:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Strategy:** Lowest/Lower Bid
* **Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement:** No

### Scope of Work

The Public Service and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of Environment and Climate Change Canada intends to acquire a Faraday Tent through a request for proposal (RFP). The scope of work includes procuring the entity and beyond.  A formal request for proposal will be issued by PSPC announcing the closing date and tender details.

### Contact Information

For any procurement related information and questions, kindly contact:

* **Contracting Authority Name:** Vick, Greg
* **Contracting Authority Email:** greg.vick@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contracting Authority Phone:** (343) 550-4125
